title: Enchanting Emerald & Polki Diamond Haaram: A Timeless Treasure
features: This exquisite Haaram features three layers of meticulously crafted design. Each layer showcases alternating Emeralds and Polki diamonds, set in a closed setting known as 'Kundhan' to enhance the brilliance of the diamonds. The Polki diamonds are skillfully arranged in a floral motif, radiating outward from the centre. The 'Hyderabadi Polish' gives the gold a unique luster, enhancing the antique feel of the piece. Intricate detailing is evident throughout the piece, emphasizing the craftsmanship of our skilled artisans.
occasions: and grand celebrations. This statement piece will elevate any festive ensemble.
